title: Clinical and Deep-Learned Evaluation of MR-Guided Self-Supervised PET Reconstruction
details: JB Hopson, S Ellis, A Flaus, CJ McGinnity, R Neji… - IEEE Transactions on …, 2024
abstract: Reduced dose Positron Emission Tomography (PET) lowers the radiation dose to patients and reduces costs. Lower count data, however, degrades reconstructed image quality. Advanced reconstruction methods help mitigate image quality losses …
